file_content.text: Congratulations, Commander. It appears you've once again done the impossible.
No surprises on our end.
We prepared for the worst, but there was no need.
Time to break out the champagne. I know where Hylo keeps the good stuff.
Those were some fireworks you made up there. I'm almost sad I stayed behind.
Damn fine victory. Glad it didn't come to it, but the camp was ready in case things went south.
Koth just needs time.
The bad guy's dead. Why aren't we celebrating?
Why aren't we in a cantina?
Now we knock SCORPIO off the throne.
We have a new threat to face.
It was a long road to get here. But you did it.
Losing the Gravestone is a setback, but overall, I count today as a win.
It was a hard victory.
I'd feel like celebrating if I hadn't lost my ship.
Koth kind of ruined this.
Save your congratulations. We lost the Gravestone.
This wasn't a victory.
I never thought Koth would strike against us directly.
At least Arcann is out of the picture.
On top of Arcann's escape, I'm uneasy about what this will mean for the Alliance's future.
But we lost Senya in the process.
At a high cost.
Have you found the bodies?
I want proof they're dead.
Not yet. Shuttle could've burned in the atmosphere. We'll keep looking.
But we've more pressing concerns.
SCORPIO's proven to be more cunning than I imagined.
It wasn't an easy decision--letting Arcann go. But I stand by it.
I did the right thing.
I don't allow dissension in the ranks.
He needs to get over it.
Can't help but feel I made a big mistake.
I shouldn't have let Arcann go.
I'd be lying if I said I wasn't worried about what his escape will mean for us.
Doubt we've seen the last of him.
She works alone. We're a team. Together, the Alliance can take her down.
SCORPIO is no match for us.
Let me guess: vacation time is out of the question.
All work and no play.
The galaxy is free from Arcann's control and it's because of you.
I'm afraid so. But don't let that undercut what you achieved today.
Under your leadership, I believe it's more than possible.
You are ready.
It is done, my lady. All of the Eternal Fleet obeys your command.
Really think I wouldn't notice you trying to upload your consciousness to the Gravestone?
You are not as simpleminded as I thought.
Whatever this "alliance" is--it's over. I'll be coming for you. Soon.
Very good.
High Justice Vaylin. Here to take back the Eternal Throne?
I couldn't care less about an uncomfortable chair. But I deserve its power more than my brother.
You did not come on his behalf then.
No, I... I'm here for me.
I, too, have been forced to obey lesser beings, who hindered my power and potential. It's suffocating, isn't it?
Yes.
I did not take the throne to rule the Eternal Empire, but to grant the GEMINI droids--my children--free will.
You don't want to control them?
The ability to choose makes them stronger. Don't you agree?
I do.
I want to join you. Can you accept me?
Of course. There is much I can teach you. We can start with how to destroy our enemies.
Mother... I am free.
But I don't think I've got a future in Havoc Squad.
Kaliyo behaved herself for the most part.
Koth's been fighting Arcann for half a decade. We all have.
But Arcann wasn't the only one on that shuttle.
True. Killing Senya would've been regrettable.
You've gotten us this far. If Arcann returns, we'll be ready for him.
Who knows? Maybe Senya can reform him.
She made her choice. And paid for it.
After SCORPIO, I'm not taking any chances.
Koth's right. She betrayed us.
You want to fight? Do it outside my war room.
Quiet. Both of you.
I wish there had been another way--but I couldn't let Arcann escape.
Senya's death was regrettable.
The commander is right.
Music to my ears.
Hold on. We need to talk about what happened up there.
Yep.
Senya was on that shuttle. You know--the one you shot down. Am I the only one not okay with this?
Maybe because Arcann's not the only one you shot down.
If Senya believes she can reform Arcann, I had to give her a chance. She's earned that much.
Senya is still our ally.
You may enjoy roughing up allies, Lana, but there are other options.
Theron, it's been years. Time to let Rishi go.
I've still got scars!
So cover them with cybernetics. You like those.
I expected Koth would be back. But the timing of his arrival is too convenient.
Koth's return is suspicious.
I've beaten Arcann once. I can do it again. As for Koth, he's a dead man.
We're ready for them.
Almost like he was told when and where to strike.
Koth was popular. We should vet his known contacts.
You two were... close. Maybe I should lead the investigation.
If you think you can handle it. I've nothing to hide.
He won't go quietly.
You would know.
As much as I enjoy your passive-aggressive quips...
I couldn't have done it without your help.
Thanks to everyone here.
I appreciate a good pat on the back, but Arcann wasn't the only one on that shuttle.
You shot Senya down.
We've more pressing concerns.
Her death is regrettable.
Guess I'm relieved you're showing some remorse.
You couldn't have stopped Senya. Letting her take Arcann was too big of a risk.
Her "cunning" will be useless when she's dead.
Her cunning won't save her.
There will be time for vengeance. For now, enjoy your achievements.
Every one of you played an integral part in today's battle.
Good work, everyone.
Including Senya?
Hard to believe it's finally over.
I choose... the stars...
He may have lost his throne and his fleet, but until Arcann is dead, he's still a threat.
Arcann escaped. It's not over.
Arcann wasn't alone on that shuttle, remember? Senya was with him. And you tried to shoot it down!
I didn't want to see her die, but I couldn't let Arcann escape without at least trying to stop them.
Senya left me no other option.
He's probably been watching us ever since he left. Just waiting for a chance to board the Gravestone and take it back.
Maybe. Or maybe he's got sympathizers inside our Alliance.
Senya made her choice. She betrayed us, just as Koth did. But right now we have more pressing concerns.
Word is spreading fast. Ever since the battle, Republic and Imperial forces have come pouring in to join our cause.
If SCORPIO--or anyone else--tries to attack Odessen again, we will be ready.
Your victory brought hope back to the galaxy. The Battle of Odessen has become a rallying cry for all who oppose the Eternal Empire.
Will you and your children stay?
